body_html:
This conversation seems to have run its course. Closing this issue since I don't know of any plans on the docs side to publish a separate Java roadmap (here's the general TF roadmap that was recently updated).

Sounds like the mailing lists/SIGs are the best way to keep up with new developments.

body:
This conversation seems to have run its course. Closing this issue since I don't know of any plans on the docs side to publish a separate Java roadmap (here's the [general TF roadmap](https://www.tensorflow.org/community/roadmap) that was recently updated).

Sounds like the mailing lists/SIGs are the best way to keep up with new developments.
